text: Jean Linssen (1904 - 1961) was a Belgian long-distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1928 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1904 births Category:1961 deaths Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Belgian male long-distance runners Category:Belgian male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of Belgium Category:Place of birth missing
title: Jean Linssen
